title: Empathy-Supported Collaborative Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical knowledge and experience in elementary science education
context.additional_context: Performing collaborative instructional design activities in a microlearning environment using digital devices, focusing on science subjects.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can define three or more problems for creative instructional design based on learner empathy
Perform 80%+ participation in the ideation-development-selection thinking process within collaborative groups
Derive creative instructional activity designs that exceed existing approaches by 30%+ using structured empathy strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
